subject: Re: improve your QS reading speed with Dictator
msgSnippet: I just thought of another way to use this program to increase one s QS reading speed, apart from using it to merely read QS prose.  It could be used as a sort
messageBody:
I just thought of another way to use this program to increase one's
QS reading speed, apart from using it to merely read QS prose. It
could be used as a sort of flashcard program (without answers,
unfortunately).

What you would do is create lists of QS words with common groups of
characters (like words ending with the "-tion" or "-ers" sounds),
arrange them randomly, and view them with Dictator. After some
practice I expect you'll come to recognize these patterns of
characters more quickly and easily when you encounter them in your
normal reading.

--Sergey
